channel.title: Audio on D0CUM3NTN4T10N
channel.description: Recent content in Audio on D0CUM3NTN4T10N

item.title: Spectrogram
item.description: Online Tools link Spectrum Analyzer Display a spectrum of signal amplitudes on different frequencies. Upload audio file like .wav or .mp3, .ogg. Spectral Analyzer Morse Code Adaptive Audio Decoder Using Audacity linkAudacity is an audio editor which also can be used for decoding signals in audio files. Open an audio file in Audacity. Click the name of the file at left menu (which contains the reverse triangle icon). In the drop-down menu, check Spectrogram.

item.title: SSTV (Slow-scan Television)
item.description: Decode SSTV linkThere are some online tools available as below. MMSSTV (for Windows) QSSTV (for Linux) sstv (Command-line tool)
